import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import RoundWrapper from '../util/RoundWrapper' import styles from './NotificationDisplay.module.css' import moment from 'moment' const NotificationDisplay = () => { const {notice} = useSelector(state=>state); const [isShow, setIsShow] = useState(false); const [msg, setMsg] = useState({}); useEffect(()=>{ if(!notice.popup) return; setIsShow(true); setMsg(notice.data[0]); },[notice]) return ( <> {isShow &&
New Notification
x
{msg.user.username} {msg.text}
{moment(msg.createdAt).fromNow()}
} ) } export default NotificationDisplay
